Escalator Maintenance Society

120 words written on Sat, Jul 9 2005

Escalator Maintenance Society just left from setting up and rehersing, and I didn’t know what to expect either, but it’s really good fun. Think Amelie. Come over! The AC is cranking, the red is ready to pour, and the Tecate is chillin. If you don’t like those options bring your own. Or I’ll make you a cup of proper tea or coffee if you like.

Update:

What a show! gush …tonight was a good night, a lot of fun with some amazing people. I love and thank you all. /gush

David Hopkins was in attendance and you can hear him describe the show in the audioblog he posted on the way home from the show (dead link).
